resources.string: This is a calculator application. This app is not yet been created. This app is not guaranteed because it is NO WARRANTY at any cost. There is a try-catch, to abnormal termination by the input value and is by design. It is also possible to fork those who are worried. Therefore, We have adopted the WTFPL license.
